showScoreExcerpt: "I found the score neither unbearable nor something I'd miss if I never heard it again...I would not discourage anyone interested from attending Mamma Mia!. But I wouldn't encourage the doubtful, either."

keyPhrases.quote: I would not discourage anyone interested from attending Mamma Mia!
But I wouldn't encourage the doubtful, either
I found the score neither unbearable nor something I'd miss if I never heard it again

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic explicitly states they neither encourage nor discourage attendance, placing this squarely in neutral territory with no clear recommendation either way. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses a neutral stance on the score and a lack of strong encouragement to see the show, leading to a mixed recommendation.
